name: Lost Motors
description:
Help the motors reach their destinations by rotating the tiles! Don't let them drive into the water/forest or they will be lost forever!

DESTINATIONS:
Cars - Village
Tractor - Farm
Digger - Mine

CONTROLS:
Left Mouse Button: Rotate tile left
Right Mouse Button: Rotate tile right
Esc: Pause

This game was made in 48 hours for the Kenney Jam 2021 game jam. The jam requires participants to use game assets only from Kenney • Free game assets

The Theme of this game jam was "Rotation".
